description:
Lion is a princess from a small country who has enrolled in Pirari Academy which is in Hokkaido. She was looking forward to starting her fun new school life with Nina, the girl she admires most... but something is amiss. Lion seems to be missing something important that she must have to be enrolled in class S.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawaii Hina ni wa Tabi o Saseru
Send Your Cute Hina on a Journey!
かわいいヒナには旅をさせろ
